original_text: So the guard no longer gave them the king's food and wine to eat. He gave vegetables and water to them instead.
korean_text: 그리하여 감독하는 자가 그들에게 지정된 음식과 마실 포도주를 제하고 채식을 주니라

sentences.original_text: So the guard no longer gave them
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 경비병은 더 이상 그들에게 주지 않았다

sentences.original_text: the king's food and wine to eat
He gave vegetables and water to them
